page.title: 16RECREATION IN ROMSLEY/HUNN.
page.content: There are two inns,"Fighting Cocks" and"The Sun",latter more favoured by locals.There is Brit.Leg.Club.Group formed in 1968 to form a Community Centre failed to get full support of village and became defunct in '70s. Many people especially women involved in voluntary activities centred in the Church Hall. "The Church Hall in Bromsgrove Road was the school until 1913 and was used for school meals from 1940-63.It is used for these clubs-White Heather, Mpthers Un.,Sunrise,W.I.,Brownies and Hist. Soc.,whist drives & coffee morns.Sunday a.m.service & Sunday Sch. 3 Drs.hold a surgery."Jeremy Clarke. "There is a tennis club &cricket club at Bluebird.I am learning to play.I like the second court with no hole in the net and the sun isn't in your eyes My dad is best player"James Whitehouse
